name: Rogue Star (itch) (MagicJuan)
description:
Single Character Dark Fantasy RPG with Rogue inspired dungeon

A tragic event leads to an encounter with Karnis, god of the Underworld.

It does not go as expected.

Better run away from those bats, I think you are too weak for them....

If you can find the dungeon and navigate its ever-changing levels, you might earn your salvation.
